Exposing the Disguised – ...

发布时间: 
原文链接: https://hwv430.blogspot.com/2016/07/exposing-disguised-isis-video-from.html

正文内容:
怎样处决叛徒？IS活割人头。场面血腥，成人也不宜。 by Acneska Video from ISIS titled “Exposing the Disguised” is a compilation of multiple prior executions, with a new beheading at the end. Video is from the Wilayat Hims district, aka Palmyra, in Syria. Skip to 6:18 for the beheading. Props to Best Gore member @refuse2renig for the video: 《Exposing the Disguised – ISIS Video from Wilayat Hims District in Syria》源地址 http://ift.tt/28YyZJt
